department: Department of Artificial Intelligence method and Applied Mathematics
faculty: Faculty of Computer Science and Information Technology
university: West Pomeranian University of Technology, Szczecin
about: Page was created to facilitate the use of MCDA methods. The Back-End side is handled using the Python-Flask module and the PYMCDM library. The Front-End was created using Node.js with the React framework.
info: In case of reporting any bugs please feel free to contact with given email.
